title: Am I the Exception to Your Credit Card Rule? (Hour 3)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

Why you're not the exception to the credit card rule,

Dealing with a toxic parent plus loan situation,

Why Dave hates I Bonds (despite the hype),

How much to save for college.


Support Our Sponsor:
Zander Insurance
